required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Low Flow Anesthesia Without Initial High Flow Phase
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Low Flow Anesthesia With and Without Initial High Flow Phase

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to compare the effectiveness of conventional low flow anesthesia (LFA) with initial high fresh gas flow ( 4L/min) for 10 minutes and LFA with fixed fresh gas flow rate (1L/min).

primary_outcome.measure: The time required to reach 0.7 MAC
number of adjustments made to the vaporizer settings
primary_outcome.description: MAC will be held between 0.6-0.8 with adjustments at the vaporizer

secondary_outcome.description: desfluane consumption at the first hour and at the end of the surgery wil be recorded

arm_group.description: After standart intravenous anesthesia induction end endotracheal intubation desflurane vaporizer will be set at 6% with fresh gas flow rate 4 L/min (50% O2, 50% air) until the EtAA concentration reaches 0.7 MAC (minimum alveolar concentration) Then, the desflurane vaporizer will be at a 1% higher value than the EtAA concentration required to achieve 0.7 MAC. And after 10 minutes fresh gas flow rate will be reduced to 1L/min.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Fixed Fresh Gas Flow Rate group
arm_group.description: After standart intravenous anesthesia induction end endotracheal intubation desflurane vaporizer will be set at 18% with fresh gas flow rate 1 L/min (50% O2, 50% air) until the EtAA concentration reaches 0.7 MAC (minimum alveolar concentration) Then, the desflurane vaporizer will be at a 2% higher value than the EtAA concentration required to achieve 0.7 MAC.

intervention.description: During the initial wash-in period 4 L/min Fresh gas flow will be used.

intervention.intervention_name: Low Flow Anesthesia with fixed fresh gas flow rate
intervention.description: Fresh gas flow rate will be 1 L/min throughout the procedure.
intervention.arm_group_label: Fixed Fresh Gas Flow Rate group

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ASA 1-3
- scheduled for surgery under general anesthesia with endotracheal intubation
Exclusion Criteria:
- hemodynamic instability
- emergency cases
- expected anesthesia duration < 60 min
- patient refusal

address.state: In The USA Or Canada, Please Select...
